POLL.TITLE: January 2023 Delegate Election - Second Round
POLL.TEXT: Please select your preferred candidate for the Local Council. Refer to the following dispatch for more information on the election and the campaigns of all candidates: https://www.nationstates.net/page=dispatch/id=1821167
POLL.AUTHOR: kringalia

DISPATCH.TITLE: Introduction to NationStates and the South Pacific (Click here if you are new!)
DISPATCH.AUTHOR: coalition_of_the_south_pacific
DISPATCH.TEXT:
[anchor=Top][/anchor][box][align=center][background-block=#88D5FF][font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120] [color=#88D5FF]—[/color][url=https://www.nationstates.net/page=display_region_rmb/region=the_south_pacific][color=#FFFFFF][b]RMB[/b][/color][/url] [/size][size=75][sup][background=#FF9900][color=#FFFFFF] LIVE [/color][/background][/sup][/size][size=120][color=#88D5FF]—[/color] [color=#88D5FF]—[/color][url=https://discordapp.com/invite/tEyyDyh][color=#FFFFFF][b]Discord[/b][/color][/url] [/size][size=75][sup][background=#FF9900][color=#FFFFFF] LIVE [/color][/background][/sup][/size][size=120][color=#88D5FF]—[/color][/size][/font][/background-block][background-block=#38B9FF][font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120] [background=#019aed][color=#019aed]—[/color][url=https://www.nationstates.net/page=dispatch/id=1192500][color=#fff][b]Home[/b][/color][/url][color=#019aed]—[/color][/background][color=#38b9ff]—[/color][url=https://www.nationstates.net/page=dispatch/id=1192503][color=#fff][b]Get Involved[/b][/color][/url][color=#38b9ff]—[/color][color=#38b9ff]—[/color][url=https://www.nationstates.net/page=dispatch/id=1230616][color=#fff][b]Guides[/b][/color][/url][color=#38b9ff]—[/color][color=#38b9ff]—[/color][url=https://www.nationstates.net/page=dispatch/id=1237123][color=#fff][b]Index[/b][/color][/url][color=#38b9ff]—[/color][color=#38b9ff]—[/color][url=https://www.nationstates.net/page=dispatch/id=1192502][color=#fff][b]Government ➔[/b][/color][/url][color=#38b9ff]—[/color][/size][/font] [img]https://img.tspforums.xyz/tsp-graphics/regional/tsp-dispatch.png[/img] [font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120]
[color=#38b9ff]—[/color][/size][/font][/background-block][/align][/box]
[box] [center][font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=250][color=#109aed][b]Welcome to NationStates and the South Pacific![/b][/color][/size][/font][/center]
[font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120]Hello there, and congratulations on founding your very own nation! We know you’ve probably got your hands full governing millions of citizens, but we also wanted to introduce you to your region. A region is simply a community of nations, and every new nation like yourself starts out in one. If you’re reading this, that means you’re in the region of the South Pacific. That’s us — welcome![/size][/font]
[font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120]But what can you do in a region? We’re glad you asked! Regions are a great way to get to know and play NationStates with other players. Every region has something different to offer, but here in the South Pacific, some of the things we’re known for include…[/size][/font] [list] [*][font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120]The [color=#109aed][b]oldest extant democracy on NationStates[/b][/color], running since 2003, with our elections, legislature, executive, and judiciary;[/size][/font][*][font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120]A [color=#109aed][b]regional military[/b][/color] that’s one of the leading forces defending other regions from attack;[/size][/font][*][font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120]Vibrant [color=#109aed][b]roleplay universes[/b][/color], where players build up the lore of their country; and[/size][/font][*][font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120]A [color=#109aed][b]friendly and welcoming community[/b][/color] of players just like you.[/size][/font][/list] [font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120]No matter what you’re interested in, we’re sure there’s something for you. The choice is yours![/size][/font]
[font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120]If you have any questions, feel free to join our [url=https://thesouthpacific.org][color=#ff9900]regional forums[/color][/url] or [url=https://discordapp.com/invite/tEyyDyh][color=#ff9900]Discord server[/color][/url] to chat with other members of our community. We'd be happy to help you![/size][/font] [/box]
[box][font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=250][color=#109aed][b][anchor=content]What can I do in the South Pacific?[/anchor][/b][/color][/size][/font] [/box]
[box][font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=170][color=#109aed][b][anchor=swan]Become a SWAN Knight[/anchor][/b][/color][/size][/font] [font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=140][color=#ff9900][b]Quick, easy, and important.[/b][/color][/size][/font]
[font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120]Becoming a SWAN Knight is perhaps the quickest and easiest way to get involved, but it’s also one of the most important. Oh, and it also comes with a pretty badge that you can see [url=https://www.nationstates.net/page=dispatch/id=1045928][color=#ff9900]here[/color][/url].[/size][/font]
[font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120][color=#109aed][b]Tell me more![/b][/color] SWAN Knights are nations that have endorsed our Delegate and members of the [url=https://www.nationstates.net/page=dispatch/id=1398091][color=#ff9900]Coral Guard[/color][/url]. An endorsement gives them the power to protect our region. Keeping the numbers of endorsements held by the Delegate and Coral Guard high keeps our region more secure from potential attackers.[/size][/font]
[font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120][color=#109aed][b]How to endorse a nation:[/b][/color] You can find the Endorse button at the bottom of each nation’s page.[/size][/font]
[font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120][color=#109aed][b]How do I become a SWAN Knight?[/b][/color] You’ll need to [url=https://www.nationstates.net/page=un][color=#ff9900]join the World Assembly[/color][/url] (NationStates’ version of the United Nation) and then do these steps:[/size][/font]
[table=noheader][tr][td=5][background-block=#1089e6][hr][center][font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=140][color=#ffffff][b]Step 1: Endorse the Delegate[/b][/color][/size][/font][/center][hr][/background-block][/td][/tr] [tr][td=5][center][font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120][nation]Tepertopia[/nation][/size][/font][/center][/td][/tr] [tr][td=5][background-block=#1089e6][hr][center][font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=140][color=#ffffff][b]Step 2: Endorse the Coral Guard nations[/b][/color][/size][/font][/center][hr][/background-block][/td][/tr] [tr][td][font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120][nation]Amerion[/nation][/size][/font][/td][td][font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120][nation]Aidenfieeld[/nation][/size][/font][/td][td][font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120][nation]Tepertopia[/nation][/size][/font][/td][td][font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120][nation]Farengeto[/nation][/size][/font][/td][td][font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120][nation]Ebonhand[/nation][/size][/font][/td][/tr][tr][td][font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120][nation]Land Without Shrimp[/nation][/size][/font][/td][td][font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120][nation]073 039 109 032 080 111 112 112 121[/nation][/size][/font][/td][td][font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120][nation]Tsunamy[/nation][/size][/font][/td][td][font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120][nation]PenguinPies[/nation][/size][/font][/td][/tr] [/table] [/box]
[box][font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=170][color=#109aed][b][anchor=assembly]Join the Assembly[/anchor][/b][/color][/size][/font] [font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=140][color=#ff9900][b]Make your voice heard.[/b][/color][/size][/font]
[font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120]The Assembly offers rich, lively political debate as it debates our region’s laws. It’s the perfect venue for you to voice your beliefs and shape our region.[/size][/font]
[font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120][color=#109aed][b]Tell me more![/b][/color] The Assembly is our regional legislature and it makes laws covering the rights of residents of our region, our foreign policy towards other regions, the way our regional officer powers are allocated, and more. It’s a great way for anyone to get started crafting our regional laws and participating in our regional politics.[/size][/font]
[font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120][color=#109aed][b]How do I join?[/b][/color] To become a legislator and join the Assembly, simply [url=https://thesouthpacific.org/signup][color=#ff9900]make an account on our regional forums[/color][/url] and then head over to the [url=https://thesouthpacific.org/w/get-involved][color=#ff9900]Getting Involved wizard[/color][/url]![/size][/font]
[font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120][url=https://thesouthpacific.org/w/get-involved][color=#ff9900]Join the Assembly ➔[/color][/url][/size][/font] [/box]
[box][font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=170][color=#109aed][b][anchor=voting]Vote in elections[/anchor][/b][/color][/size][/font] [font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=140][color=#ff9900][b]Participate in NationStates’ oldest democracy.[/b][/color][/size][/font]
[font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120]One of our proudest traditions, our elections highlight our spirited political culture and offer you a chance to participate in NationStates’ oldest extant democracy.[/size][/font]
[font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120][color=#109aed][b]Tell me more![/b][/color] We hold elections for government officials including our Prime Minister (PM) and our Delegate. Our PM is in charge of things like regional events, welcoming new players (like you!), and diplomacy with other regions. Our Delegate is the person in our region with the most endorsements and serves as our head of state.[/size][/font]
[font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120][color=#109aed][b]How do I vote?[/b][/color] To vote for the Delegate or the PM, you'll need to become a legislator (a member of the Assembly, our law-making body). Simply [url=https://thesouthpacific.org/signup][color=#ff9900]make an account on our regional forums[/color][/url] and then head over to the [url=https://thesouthpacific.org/w/get-involved][color=#ff9900]Getting Involved wizard[/color][/url]![/size][/font]
[font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120][url=https://www.nationstates.net/page=dispatch/id=1192504][color=#ff9900]Learn more about elections[/color][/url][/size][/font] [/box]
[box][font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=170][color=#109aed][b][anchor=military]Join the military[/anchor][/b][/color][/size][/font] [font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=140][color=#ff9900][b]Protect innocent regions across NationStates.[/b][/color][/size][/font]
[font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120]Our military offers exciting, fast-paced gameplay and the chance to defend innocent regions and communities all across NationStates from unjustified attacks.[/size][/font]
[font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120][color=#109aed][b]Tell me more![/b][/color] NationStates doesn’t have wars between nations, but it does have military gameplay with regions. Our military is a defender military, which means we protect innocent regions from the military forces that try to take them over simply because they enjoy it. If that sounds interesting, or you just want some fast-paced gameplay, enlisting in our military is for you![/size][/font]
[font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120][color=#109aed][b]How do I join?[/b][/color] To enlist in our regional military, the South Pacific Special Forces, simply [url=https://thesouthpacific.org/signup][color=#ff9900]make an account on our regional forums[/color][/url] and then head over to the [url=https://thesouthpacific.org/w/get-involved][color=#ff9900]Getting Involved wizard[/color][/url]![/size][/font]
[font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120][url=https://thesouthpacific.org/w/get-involved][color=#ff9900]Join the South Pacific Special Forces ➔[/color][/url][/size][/font] [/box]
[box][font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=170][color=#109aed][b][anchor=roleplay]Participate in roleplay[/anchor][/b][/color][/size][/font] [font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=140][color=#ff9900][b]Build up your country’s lore and history.[/b][/color][/size][/font]
[font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120]Our roleplay communities are a perfect outlet to unleash your creativity and formulate your country’s lore and history.[/size][/font]
[font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120][color=#109aed][b]Tell me more![/b][/color] Many NationStates players enjoy roleplay, where you get to build up the lore of your country and its people with other players. Whether you’re looking to write stories about your people, report on news from your nation, or simulate trade relations or even war, roleplay is a great choice to get involved.[/size][/font]
[font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120][color=#109aed][b]How do I roleplay?[/b][/color] To join our roleplay community, simply [url=https://thesouthpacific.org/signup][color=#ff9900]make an account on our regional forums[/color][/url] and start reading or posting in one of our roleplay universes there. You can also join the [url=https://discord.gg/58aX2yhmqF][color=#ff9900]dedicated roleplay Discord server[/color][/url] to chat with other roleplayers.[/size][/font]
[font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120][url=https://thesouthpacific.org/signup][color=#ff9900]Join the forums ➔[/color][/url][/size][/font] [/box]
[box][font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=170][color=#109aed][b][anchor=culture]Participate in the executive branch[/anchor][/b][/color][/size][/font] [font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=140][color=#ff9900][b]More players, more fun.[/b][/color][/size][/font]
[font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120]The executive branch of our government offers a variety of fun activities that you can do ranging from ambassadors to other regions, cultural event organizers, dispatch writers, graphic designers, and more! If you ever want to run for election, this is a great path to gain more experience![/size][/font]
[font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120][color=#109aed][b]Tell me more![/b][/color] The executive branch consists of the ministries that run the day-to-day operations of the region. The Ministry of Foregin Affairs has ambassadors to communicate with other regions. The Ministry of Regional Affairs hosts regional activities and festivals. Events from the past have included movie screenings, online game nights, festivals with other regions, and more. They also maintain our various guides (like this one), make recruitment telegrams, and do other stuff to attract nations and integrate them into our community.[/size][/font]
[font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120][color=#109aed][b]How do I join?[/b][/color] To participate in activities of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs or/and the Ministry of Regional Affairs you just need to come into our [url=https://discordapp.com/invite/tEyyDyh][color=#ff9900]Discord server[/color][/url]'s #executive-planning channel or [url=https://thesouthpacific.org/c/cabinet/10][color=#ff9900]the Cabinet subforum[/color][/url]. You will find activities to do there! No formal registration or experience needed.[/size][/font]
[font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120][url=https://discordapp.com/invite/tEyyDyh][color=#ff9900]Our Discord server ➔[/color][/url][/size][/font] [/box]
[box][font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=250][color=#109aed][b][anchor=unsure]Still not sure?[/anchor][/b][/color][/size][/font]
[font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120]That’s okay! We think we have a little bit to offer everyone, but if nothing catches your eye right now, no worries! We’d love to just chat with you and get to know you a bit better. Feel free to [url=https://thesouthpacific.org/signup][color=#ff9900]make an account[/color][/url] on our regional forums or [url=https://discordapp.com/invite/tEyyDyh][color=#ff9900]join our Discord server[/color][/url].[/size][/font]
[font=Avenir, Segoe UI, sans-serif][size=120][url=https://thesouthpacific.org/signup][color=#ff9900]Join the forums ➔[/color][/url] | [url=https://discordapp.com/invite/tEyyDyh][color=#ff9900]Join the Discord ➔[/color][/url][/size][/font] [/box]
[box][align=center][background-block=#2280C3][url=https://www.nationstates.net/region=the_south_pacific][color=#ff9900][img]https://img.tspforums.xyz/tsp-graphics/regional/footer-dispatch.png[/img][/color][/url] [color=#2280C3]·[/color] [color=#2280C3]·[/color] [url=https://www.nationstates.net/region=the_south_pacific][color=#ff9900][img]https://i.imgur.com/NYenHvV.png[/img][/color][/url][color=#2280C3]—[/color][url=https://discordapp.com/invite/tEyyDyh][color=#ff9900][img]https://i.imgur.com/JyO4OrT.png[/img][/color][/url][color=#2280C3]—[/color][url=https://thesouthpacific.org][color=#ff9900][img]https://i.imgur.com/SEpkSix.png[/img][/color][/url] [color=#2280C3]·[/color] [color=#2280C3]·[/color] [/background-block][/align][/box]

BANNER.NAME: On the Water
BANNER.VALIDITY: Prioritize the environment over the economy

BANNER.NAME: Giving Back
BANNER.VALIDITY: Extend your citizens' average lifespan beyond 70 years

FACTION.NAME: The Potato Alliance
FACTION.DESC:
[b][color=green]Welcome to The Potato Alliance[/b][/color]
[b]We are accepting no ceasefire agreements or diplomatic outreach[/b]
[b]Important Links:[/b]
[url=https://discord.gg/EmYWTkDc][b]Discord[/b] [/url] | [b][url=https://www.nationstates.net/page=dispatch/id=874170]N-Day Basics[/url][/b]| [b][url=https://www.nationstates.net/page=dispatch/id=1842545]Member Regions[/url][/b] | [b][url=https://www.nationstates.net/page=dispatch/id=1842546]Ground Rules[/url][/b]| [url=https://www.nationstates.net/page=dispatch/id=1842553][b]Useful Tech[/url][/b] | [b][url=https://www.nationstates.net/page=dispatch/id=1842563]Our Strategy[/url][/b]| [b][url=https://www.nationstates.net/page=dispatch/id=1842560]Getting Started[/url][/b]|
[b]ORDERS:[/b]
[b]BUILD AND USE SHIELDS AT WILL
BATHE IN GLORIOUS RADIATION MY COMRADES. BRING THE BEAUTY OF RADIATION TO ALL.[/b]
